channel.title: groff on SoBo's Dev Log
channel.description: Recent content in groff on SoBo's Dev Log

item.title: Man pages with Markdown and Pandoc
item.description: Man pages are awesome. They genuinely are. In any *nix system you can just get documentation on your programs or even some programming things (namely a lot of C stuff, this was very useful in University) offline by just using a tiny simple command.
